preview.html: Therefore, we will explain to you the interpretations that the vision holds for single, married, and pregnant women, so follow us. Giving onions in a dream Seeing onions in a dream is a sign of a lot of goodness and a lot that the dreamer will achieve soon. If the dreamer is looking for work and sees green onions in his dream, this is a sign that his dreams It will come true. Seeing a lot of onions in the dreamer’s house is evidence that he will get a lot of money, which he gets through an inheritance from one of his relatives. If the dreamer sees that he is giving onions to a sick person, this is a sign that he has recovered from the disease and that he is in good health. In the event that the dreamer He suffers from many debts, and sees in his dream that someone is giving him onions, then this is a sign for the dreamer to pay off all debts. Seeing peeling onions in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is facing the punishments and difficulties that he faces on his way. Read also: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqGiving onions In a dream for a man: If a man sees himself giving onions to someone, this is a sign of good and happy news. If the dreamer sees that he is giving his wife dry onions, this is a sign that the wife will be exposed to disagreements and marital problems. By seeing him eating green onions, it shows happiness, stability, and affection between him and his wife, and shows the end Disagreements. Giving onions in a dream to a married woman. Seeing onions in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she is making the right decisions on her own. If a married woman sees rotten onions in her dream, this indicates her inability to take responsibility for herself. If a woman sees that she is eating onions and finds it ugly If a married woman sees that she You eat green onions, as this is a sign of achieving goals and desires. Giving onions in a dream to an unmarried woman. Seeing onions in a dream to an unmarried woman is evidence that she is suffering from the difficult crises she faces in her life. But if a girl sees a young man she does not know giving her green onions, this is good news. That she will marry him soon. If an unmarried woman sees that she is cooking onions, this is a sign of achieving what she dreams about, her goals and desires. Seeing cutting onions in a girl’s dream is evidence of her bad reputation among others. If a girl sees that someone is giving her green onions, this indicates the collapse of problems and the beginning of A happy and new life. If a woman sees herself giving onions, this is a sign that she She hides a secret from her husband, and this causes her many problems. Seeing a pregnant woman eating onions is evidence that she is suffering from diseases. Seeing red onions indicates

title: The dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream, which was explained by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Reading the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. Reading the Qur’an in a dream is proof of the purity of the heart and the good condition of the dreamer. Seeing the recitation of the Qur’an in the dream of the person concerned is evidence of relief from distress and salvation from these worries and problems. Dreaming of reading the Qur’an in a dream can also indicate payment of debts and profit from trade. Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman. A single girl’s dream in a dream that he is reading the Qur’an, but with a distorted voice and in the wrong way, this indicates that he is far from God Almighty. But if he sees that he is reading a Qur’anic surah in intimidation and torture, then this is evidence of undesirable events, and a warning from some. The bad deeds that he does. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream reading the Qur’an in a very low voice, this indicates pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is carrying the Qur’an, this indicates the end of problems and freedom from evil. Seeing a dream about reading Reciting the Qur’an in a beautiful and loud voice means that you will hear happy news. Seeing that he is buying the Qur’an and reading the Qur’an from him means that he will obtain a prominent position at work. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman reading the Qur’an in a dream indicates that she will be free from the problems of pregnancy and childbirth in the near future. Seeing the Qur’an recited in a dream means an easy birth filled with many good things. Reading the Qur’an in a dream for a married man. Seeing a man reading the Qur’an in a dream, especially the verses that indicate seeking refuge from Satan, indicates freedom from worries and problems. Seeing a married man reading the Qur’an and focusing on The verses in which he asks for forgiveness indicate good circumstances, guidance, and walking on the path of truth. As for a man’s dream that he asks for forgiveness after praying and reading the Qur’an, this indicates that God will respond to the supplication that God is upon him.Reading the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream The interpreters have interpreted it with many, many interpretations, the most important of which are These interpretations. This is reading the Qur’an. It indicates closeness to God, a heart filled with faith and a constant desire to listen to the Qur’an. It may have another interpretation, which is that the person dreams of abandoning the Qur’an. This dream came to remind him to constantly approach God. Others explain that the dreamer carries many worries and wants to get rid of them. Among them is reading the Qur’an. Reading the Qur’an in a dream in a jinn. Commentators differ about the interpretation of reciting the Qur’an over the jinn, as some believe that the dreamer is surrounded by many obsessions. He also always thinks about the jinn, demons, and other obsessions that control his thoughts, and this appears in his dreams. Some may interpret this as being close. From God, and always thinks about it, and knows that the Qur’an has a magical effect in getting rid of obsessive thoughts. Others interpret it as the dreamer’s heart being filled with the recitation of the Qur’an, and faith controlling him and expelling the jinn and intermediaries from his life. The inability to read the Qur’an. Interpretation of reading skills. The Qur’an differs from one person to another, because Reading the Qur’an is a sign of closeness to God. If the dreamer finds it difficult to read

title: Interpretation of the dream of buying eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars, interpretation of the dream of buying local eggs, interpretation of the dream of buying chicken eggs, and buying red eggs in a dream

preview.html: All you are looking for is to know the interpretation of buying eggs in a dream. The interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream. Its interpretation depends on the size, color and type of the egg. Did the dreamer buy eggs and immediately wake up from sleep? Or he saw that he bought it and ate it, because each vision has a separate interpretation, and in the following paragraphs you will find dozens of important meanings to interpret your dream, follow them until the end. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Buying eggs in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about buying eggs indicates the dreamer’s offspring, and if a man dreams of buying three or four eggs, God will give him three girls or boys according to the context of the dream. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying only egg yolks, then he He gains a lot of gold, but if he buys white ones, the vision shows silver, meaning that the dreamer buys silver with his money. If the dreamer buys a lot of eggs randomly in a dream, he will gain a lot of money, which, unfortunately, can be wasted on them and lost in matters Useless. But if he sees that he is buying boiled eggs, then this is a lot of food and money that will last with him, and will not be wasted on trifles. When the dreamer buys parrot eggs, the vision is interpreted according to the social status of the dreamer. If he is married, God will bless him with a good, pious daughter. But if he is single, then this is good news that he will not be happy in his marriage, because he will marry a girl who enjoys chastity and piety. If the dreamer enters a place where eggs are sold and buys from it many eggs of different colors and sizes, then God will not deprive him of having a boy and a girl in his life. And when there are many God is from chicken eggs, his livelihood is permissible, and if he takes an egg from a hen’s eggs, the dream indicates that the money and livelihood is not a lot, so he will get it in the near future. Buying eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer buys large eggs, then he will become a father of many children. Males, but if he buys small eggs in his dream, this is evidence that he will give birth to females and raise them well, God willing. The symbol of buying eggs according to Ibn Sirin indicates success of all kinds, whether it is success at work, increasing money, or success in romantic relationships, etc., but if he sees The dreamer himself takes eggshells and eats them. He is a fool and his actions are full of mistakes. He harms people and despises them. If the dreamer returns home with a quantity of eggs and unfortunately they fall and they are completely destroyed, then he does not enjoy his money and loses it. If the eggs in the dreamer’s vision indicate health and matters related to his physical condition, and he saw It fell from his hand and was completely broken, and this is a sadness for him in his life, and it will be a sick disease that afflicts him. If the dreamer sees that he is buying huge quantities of eggs, and collects a lot of them by the end of the dream, then he earns money, collects them, and spends a little of it only because he wants to be one of the wealthy people of society. If a married woman sees her husband collecting eggs and giving them to her, then she will give birth to many children, in addition to the bliss and luxury that it provides her in her life. What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing buying eggs in a dream: buying eggs

title: Interpretation of feces in a dream - seeing feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the feces and excrement of a single, married, pregnant, or divorced girl, whether she is defecating in the street, at home, on the bed in front of people, or on the hand and clothes when washing them. Children’s excrement and cleaning the bathroom and toilet according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of excrement and excrement in a dream. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees himself defecating in a dream, then money comes to him. Daniel said: A dream of human excrement is forbidden. Money. Animal dung is of two types: As for an animal whose flesh is eaten, it is legitimate money, such as income and spoils. And tax, salary, charity, or whatever is on the way or a gift. As for an animal whose meat is not eaten, whether it has fangs or claws, it is forbidden from the dark side. Whoever dreams of eating waste is affected by forbidden money that he hates getting, and greed overwhelms him with remorse, and he may He speaks harshly and regrets it. What comes out of a person’s stomach and animal waste is money, but what is eaten as dung is permissible money, and what is not eaten as dung is forbidden. If the stool is hot, then he is sick or accused of a crime. If he sees himself defecating, he will fall into sin. If he poops in his pants, his wife will be angry. From him, it is said that he becomes angry with his wife and oppresses her. If he defecates on his clothes, he commits an indecency. Whoever sees that he is defecating in the place where he fell, then he spends his money on his desires. Whoever sees that some of it has urinated and the rest is delayed, then he will lose some of his money with his own hands and the rest will be lost through effort. Al-Kirmani said: “If it is from A person leaves money according to its value. Whoever sees that he excretes in his bed with his wife, then there is talk between him and her, and if she has a voice, it will be louder. If the excrement is in the garment or the vessel, then it came out because of the woman. If it is like mud and there is a dispersed virgin in it, then she will disturb them and fear the rulers. If The stool is liquid, then this means that the disease is over. If he defecates under it, and those around him do not feel the lack of money, and neither his partner nor his family knows about it. If the place is unknown, then he is spending prohibited money out of his kindness, without reward or praise. Jaber Al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees that he is impure with feces while he is in A high place means he will get money, and if he is in a place he hates and it is lower than him, he will be harmed by. The ruler’s side. “And among them are those who said that they had a dream about excrement, and if it was in something that he hated to be in while he was awake, then it is anxiety and distress, and perhaps it is something that he hates or that he should not have. Al-Kirmani said: If it comes out of a person, it comes out of money according to its value. And whoever sees If he defecates in a place and covers it with dirt, then he is burying money. Interpretation of excrement in a dream: excrement in a dream is food from an oppressor, and it was said: evidence of relief, and whoever sees that it is a hadith, his sadness will go away. If he has money, he must pay zakat on his money. If he dreams that he has defecated a lot while on a trip, then he is not traveling and his road is blocked. (Seeing feces) And whoever sees that feces has come out, he has two paths: fear of authority and a fine, and the traveler must block the road. My grandfather, or he divorces his wife, or in a place that she covers with dirt and then buries the money. It is also forbidden for someone who is seen defecating an animal, even if he is one of his favorites, he will have good offspring. Seeing the excrement of a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, then

title: Dream interpretation of dates and dates

preview.html: Dream interpretation of dates and datesIt is said in the interpretations of scholars that the interpretation of this dream with palm trees and dates is a good omen and soon gives meaning to the good news and also predicts an improvement in circumstances and a change in life for the better. It is also said that her complexion is good for a girl, and if she sees that she is walking on the road under palm trees, then this is good news from God Almighty about the upcoming marriage, and that this marriage will be fruitful and fruitful. The house will be blessed and happy. In this article we will provide information about the interpretation of a dream about dates and dates through the site Various. Interpretation of dreams about dates and dates and their meaning. If a married man sees that there is a palm tree bearing dates or dates in his dream, then this dream indicates that his wife will become pregnant this year and that the child will be a boy. If a girl sees An unmarried woman sees a palm trunk in her dream, then this dream indicates that this dreamer will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about dates and dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned the interpretation of a dream about palm trees and dates in a dream in several important points: If the dreamer sees that he has many palm trees in his dream, then this The dream indicates that he controls people, and if the dreamer is a merchant, then this dream indicates an increase in his trade and the abundance of his wealth. If the dreamer sees in his dream a dry palm, then this dream shows the hypocrisy of this person. If the dreamer sees himself uprooting a palm tree in a specific area in his dream, This indicates that he will witness in that region an epidemic, disease, and perhaps anger and distress from the Sultan. If the dreamer sees a cut palm in his dream and that dreamer intends to travel in reality, then this dream indicates that his trip will be hated and interrupted. If one sees a palm tree in his dream, and it grows That kernel suddenly became a palm tree, then this dream indicates that there is a young boy who will grow up to become a useful scientist for his community or that a humble person will do so. He becomes a scholar. If a person sees a palm tree in his dream, this dream indicates longevity and children. If a married woman sees a palm tree in her dream, this dream indicates pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about dates and appointments in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a palm tree in her dream, This dream indicates that it is a good omen and good news for her and a source of optimism. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a fruitful palm tree, then this dream indicates the marriage of that girl, and the long palm tree indicates kindness and abundance of food. If an unmarried girl sees that she is planting palm trees in her dream, then This dream shows the great effort she is making, but she finds comfort in many ways. If an unmarried girl sees herself climbing a palm tree in her dream, this dream indicates her marriage this year, and therefore the palm tree in a dream is the husband in a dream in general. Interpretation of a dream about dates In a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she has planted many palm trees in her dream, then this dream indicates that this woman will give birth to many good children. If a pregnant woman sees that she has planted a palm tree in her dream, then this dream indicates that this woman will give birth to a new baby and it will be This baby is a boy

If one sees a palm tree in his dream, and it grows That kernel suddenly became a palm tree, then this dream indicates that there is a young boy who will grow up to become a useful scientist for his community or that a humble person will do so. He becomes a scholar. If a person sees a palm tree in his dream, this dream indicates longevity and children. If a married woman sees a palm tree in her dream, this dream indicates pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about dates and appointments in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a palm tree in her dream, This dream indicates that it is a good omen and good news for her and a source of optimism. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a fruitful palm tree, then this dream indicates the marriage of that girl, and the long palm tree indicates kindness and abundance of food. If an unmarried girl sees that she is planting palm trees in her dream, then This dream shows the great effort she is making, but she finds comfort in many ways. If an unmarried girl sees herself climbing a palm tree in her dream, this dream indicates her marriage this year, and therefore the palm tree in a dream is the husband in a dream in general. Interpretation of a dream about dates In a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she has planted many palm trees in her dream, then this dream indicates that this woman will give birth to many good children. If a pregnant woman sees that she has planted a palm tree in her dream, then this dream indicates that this woman will give birth to a new baby and it will be This baby is a boy

title: Interpretation of lemon in a dream and seeing a lemon in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of lemon for the single, for the married, for the pregnant, for the divorced, for the married and for the single. If the sweet and sour are picked from the tree, buy from the market, eat fresh yellow-green food, drink steak juice from Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a dream about lemon in a dream. Seeing lemon in a dream indicates livelihood and money. If its color is green, but if its color is yellow in the dream, then this indicates illness. If one dreams of seeing a lemon tree in a dream, this indicates that there is a religious and righteous person among the people who will benefit from it and help them. However, if one dreams of seeing lemons in a dream where the dreamer was Eating lemons in a dream, this dream is an indication to the dreamer that he will obtain a legitimate livelihood and a lot of money. But if the dreamer sees someone giving the dreamer a lemon to eat, then this dream is a sign that this person will accuse the dreamer of some private matter between them. If a woman sees a lemon tree in a dream, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer is a generous woman and uses her money to help others. So this dream is a sign of approaching goodness and living. Some interpreters believe that the lemon tree in the dream indicates a father who carries worries or a guardian. If one dreams of drinking lemon juice, this means that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and fears, but if the dreamer sees himself Giving a cup of lemonade to someone means that the dreamer will suffer from many problems and worries. The dreamer also feels that this person does not love him. If a married woman sees a lemon in a dream and its color is green, this is basically good news that she will get a living and money, her luck will improve and her life will change for the better. If the color of the lemon is yellow, then this dream shows the problems and obstacles that she and her husband will face. If a married woman picks a lemon in a dream, then this is good news for the dreamer that she will give birth to a child. If one dreams of picking lemons from trees, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain something valuable, Which will be either abundant knowledge or a lot of money. If one dreams that he is picking lemons from trees and does not drink their juice, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance, God willing, and if one sees a large lemon tree with many branches, then this tree is a metaphor for the mother. But if you sit under its shade in a dream, that is a metaphor for the wife. Interpretation of lemons in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees a lemon, whether it is in season or not, will fall ill because of its yellow color, and if it is green, then it is sad, and if you do not eat it, it is easier than it was. Referred. Interpretation of a dream about lemon in a dream. Lemon can refer to the accused, or those who accuse the person, or the people who are accusing... because of the linguistic alliteration between the words. Lemon in a dream is beneficial for the one who is accustomed to eating it in food... and his livelihood can appear good if It was accompanied by foods that are usually used with it... and it can show patience and tolerance in difficult matters because it is put in some bitter foods to alleviate bitterness... and because they say in proverbs: “So-and-so

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing figs in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a man eating figs? He will have wonderful offspring. What does it mean to see fig leaves? A sign of anxiety and great sadness. What is the interpretation of seeing a fig market at an inappropriate time? This means that others envy you and harm you. What does it mean to see figs picked from the tree You will get the money you get from the tree. What is the interpretation of seeing figs gathered in a bag or bowl? It means success and money. The interpretation of a dream about figs is a lot of money that you get after hard work and a little hard work. If a person eats figs, he will have Abundant offspring. Figs may come to you from some Arab countries such as Iraq. The Nabulsi fig said to him: “The amount of money” means a lot of money that you take at once. Fig leaves are a sign of great sadness and sorrow. Fig fruits mean the righteous people with whom you mix. If you see Black figs, and the dream was when the figs appeared, then this is a source of livelihood that will affect you. Seeing a fig tree in a dream Seeing a fig tree in a dream means a righteous person who has many enemies, and perhaps Nabulsi is like the fig tree among the righteous, because the tree produces good fruits. At the same time, she seeks refuge in It is where snakes live, and if there is more than one tree, this means that you are walking with good friends. You will benefit from it, and it is better to see white figs than black figs. As for the interpretation of a dream about dried figs, it is money saved for you, and it will come to you after a while. Buying figs in Dream: To dream of buying figs prematurely means that you are vulnerable to envy and harm from others. Black figs mean sadness, fatigue, and unhappiness that afflicts you for a period of time. Figs are a sign that removes you from a high position or a position of prestige to a lower rank. Interpretation of dreaming of figs without their time also means sadness. Dream. Figs for single people: Figs mean a new home if the man is not married. Then seeing figs for a single person means marriage soon. Dreaming of figs, as if you were planting them in your home, means that you will enter into lawful business or projects. Take figs from the tree, you will get the money you got from The tree. The interpretation of seeing figs while picking and eating them means that you will reap goodness from the quantity you have collected. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman. The interpretation of a dream of figs in a dream for an unmarried woman. Its interpretation does not differ from the interpretation of an individual in terms of the meaning of marriage, while the interpretation of a dream about figs is that you throw them on the ground or take them from trees and throw them. On the ground, it means that you will miss opportunities and a lot of money will be lost. If the fig accidentally falls on the ground, it means that some scammers will set you up and steal your money, while if you collect figs in a bag or bowl, for example, it means success and money. Dream of eating figsDream of eating figs And eating more than one means sustenance and benefit, and it is said that it is a lot of money. Then you see a small amount of figs, the little money you get, but this money has a blessing, and it will benefit you a lot. Then the dream in which you eat black figs means regret or sadness as a result The sins you committed.

title: Interpretation of seeing surviving an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of seeing yourself surviving an earthquake in a dream for different occasions. An earthquake is an environmental disaster that harms people and causes great losses in their lives and money. They may end up losing a loved one who is dear to his life, as it is assumed that he survived the earthquake and got out of it safely. It is incredible in the mind, so what are these interpretations that came to explain the dream of emerging from the dust of the earthquake and its collapses, and are they visions worthy of praise? Or does this not bode well? This takes you through an encyclopedia in our article to decipher the symbols of amulets, so follow us. Surviving an earthquake in a dream. There are many interpretations of seeing surviving an earthquake in a dream, carrying connotations and symbols. Dream interpreters from Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Usaimi interpreted the interpretations contained in the books of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Sheikh of interpreters Ibn Sirin sees an earthquake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an earthquake as one of the unpleasant visions that do not bode well, because it indicates successive tribulations that correspond to the dreamer’s life on the ground, and God knows best. Seeing an earthquake In a dream, it symbolizes a dreamer who has suffered many losses and injured many people, but some survive even the calamity that befell the place he saw in the dream. Seeing an earthquake in a dream causing buildings to completely collapse, especially if the dreamer sees disasters coming to his residence, is one of Visions that do not bode well, because they lead the dreamer to suffer many losses in his life. There is no savior except God Almighty, Lord of the Worlds. Seeing an earthquake in a dream indicates the problems that will enter his life, so he should seek help from God Almighty. Seeing a strong earthquake causing changes in the movement of the heavens in a dream suggests to the visionary that the wrath of God has descended on the people of the earth because of their actions. Which he is not satisfied with, and that God is All-Knowing. Invisible. Seeing an earthquake in the desert symbolizes a major change in that place, changing its conditions from space to building and construction and making it fertile ground. Seeing an earthquake or an earthquake under the dreamer’s feet in a dream means that he will be exposed to many problems in his life and will fall into problems that will make him feel sad. And God knows best. Seeing the destruction of houses and houses due to a strong earthquake leads to the emergence of many problems and problems that affect the viewer in his reality, and God knows best. An earthquake in a dream Al-Osaimi The dream interpretation scholar Imam Al-Osaimi explains seeing an earthquake in a dream in detail, and this is what we will explain in the following lines: That You see yourself escaping from an earthquake in a dream according to Imam Al-Osaimi, this indicates that the dreamer in reality is escaping from problems and successive problems in his reality, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an earthquake in his dream, this means fear and anxiety in the depths of his heart. Surviving the earthquake in a dream for single people. An unmarried girl is looking into Dream interpretation books about evidence and symbols for seeing the terrible earthquake disaster that everyone fears as a result of many losses. Seeing an unmarried woman surviving the earthquake in a dream

title: Interpretation of murder in a dream

preview.html: Seeing him in a dream symbolizes weakness and weakness, and today we will talk in detail through your website gptafser.com/ to see a murder in a dream for a man and a woman. Interpretation of seeing a murder in a dream for a single girl. A single girl who dreams of a man trying to kill him and succeeds in killing him and getting rid of him. It is a sign However, if an unmarried girl sees herself killing someone, this may cause her pain or discomfort in a dream. It is a vision that shows that she is suffering from severe psychological pressure that makes her sad. But he will emerge from it with full strength, God willing, and God knows best. And about a single girl who dreams of killing the young man she loves. This dream symbolizes that she is seeking to control the relationship with her lover. And when an unmarried girl sees in a dream a vision of murder, it is a sign that she feels helpless and powerless in her life. And God knows best. As for the only girl who sees herself killing her father in a dream, it is a metaphor for her feeling of extreme oppression as a result of her father’s pressure and control over her, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees a young man killing her in a dream, this is a sign that someone loves her very much in reality. See also: Dream interpretation of death by gunshot. Interpretation of witnessing a murder in a dream for a married woman. And when a married woman sees herself killing someone she knows in reality during her dream. It is a sign that this person is causing her discomfort because he is blackmailing her for something and she wants to get rid of him, and God knows best. As for the married woman who She sees in her dream that she kills her husband and he dies, so she regrets what she did in the dream. This dream means that there are big problems between them and he is trying to solve them so that their marital life is stable, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees that her husband is the one who killed her in the dream, this is a good vision. Because she It indicates that her husband loves her very much and is loyal to her, and she enjoys family stability. Seeing a murder in a married woman’s dream means distress, poverty, and weakness. If a married woman sees herself killing children in a dream while she is giving birth to children, this is a metaphorical expression of the intensity of her care for them. Interpretation of seeing murder In a man’s dream and its meaning: A man dreams of killing another person by hitting him in the head. This is a sign that the dreamer is being persecuted in his life in general, and God knows best. But a married man who sees himself killing his wife in a dream. This dream symbolizes his great love for her and that he resolves any problems or disagreements. Between them. And when a man sees that he is killing an old woman in a dream, and he does not feel remorse for it in the dream. It is a good vision that he leaves all the pleasures and desires of this world, and only thinks about the afterlife, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about someone trying to kill me with a bullet. Meaning of killing in A pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: A pregnant woman sees herself swallowing a gelatinous substance that she recognizes in a dream and that conflicts with it in reality. This dream indicates the end of the dispute, and it benefits some people, and God knows best. And if the pregnant woman sees that she is killing the fetus immediately after its birth. This vision indicates the health of the newborn and the abundance of food.
